page.title: 06EDUCATION IN PRESTON CAPES
page.content:
There is no school now in Preston Capes. A bus service is provided to Woodford Halse C.P. School and to Southbrook Comprehensive. Most of the young children are taken by car the four miles to Badby C.P. School.
Preston Capes Educational Charity for young people under 25 years of age, resident in the Parish of Preston Capes and in need of financial assistance. Provides financial asssistance, clothing, tools, instruments or books for them to persue their education including music, arts and physical training not provided by the Local Authority. Applications made to the Trustees.
Adult Education Classes are held here.
